In Focus











Voters' Service Portal
The Voters' Service Portal, provided by the Election Commission of India, offers several online services. These include searching electoral rolls, downloading e-EPICs, locating polling stations and officers, including Non-Resident Indian (NRI) names in the electoral roll, applying for corrections, and transposing entries in the electoral roll etc.
Visit Site
